name: MANE
description:
SIMPLE. STRONG. STRATEGIC.
We design compelling digital experiences for the web and mobile.
MANE is a digital product design and development agency founded in 2007 with a vision to create outstanding digital products for the web and beyond.
WE CAN HELP YOU WITH:
• Product Development 
• Strategic Thinking 
• User Experience Design (UXD)
• User Interface Design (UI) 
• Mobile Responsive Web Design
• Mobile Apps
• Custom Web Apps 
• Custom CMS Integration 
• Front-end Development 
• Back-end Development
ABOUT US
We are highly specialized in web and mobile user interface and interaction design as well as front-end and back-end development, delivering remarkable and lasting user experiences.
We have worked with brands such as Fruit of the Loom, Heineken, Indera, Lowe’s, Kobalt and National Center for Families Learning.
SOME OF THE PROJECTS WE’VE WORKED ON ARE FUNDED BY:
• Verizon Foundation
• PNC Financial Services Group, Inc.
• Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
• W.K. Kellogg Foundation
• Toyota
Our projects range from education, information technology, social networking, marketing, news and entertainment to architecture, apparel, tools, construction, pharmaceutical and more.
See what we create → www.manedigital.co/work
KEY BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH US INCLUDE:
• Highly effective brand differentiation
• Exceptional user experience design
• Robust and secure technology development platforms
• Strategic advantage in unified and versatile team
• Ability to scale resources according to your needs
YOU ALSO ENJOY:​
• Proactive team 
• Agile collaboration 
• Streamlined production 
• Transparent communication 
Start your digital journey → www.manedigital.co
